subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills placed the starting cornerback Jason Webster on injured reserve. Webster’s season is over after he broke his forearm in the second half of Buffalo’s 15-14 season-opening loss to Denver last Sunday. It is not clear how he was hurt, but it is the latest blow to an already injury-depleted defense as the team prepares to play at Pittsburgh on Sunday.
